original: ***The Ocean Base is starting to explode!***
***Find a place to hide and hold here for 45secs until a path is clear!!***
zh_trans: ***找到地方藏起来并坚守到45秒，直至路障清除***

original: ***Path clear. Make your way to the other end of the base before it's too late!***
zh_trans: ***路障已清除。请尽快赶到基地的另一端！***

original: ***Research path opening in 7secs. RUN!!***
zh_trans: ***研究所道路将在7秒后开启，准备撤退！***

original: ***Swim to the wrecked ship. We'll have to go through the hole in the hull.***
zh_trans: ***游到那艘失事的船上。我们必须穿过船体上的缺口***

original: ***Old Lab path opening in 5secs. RUN!!***
zh_trans: ***旧实验室的路还有5秒钟开启，快跑！***

original: ***Break the glass and make your way across the ship's hull.***
***The lift is out of power. We'll have to go through the hole in the hull.***
zh_trans: ***电梯没电了。我们不得不穿过船体上的缺口***

original: ***If we break the weak glass we can't make it back into the base.***
zh_trans: ***如果我们打碎那些脆弱的玻璃，我们将无法返回基地***

original: ***Ocean Base status critical!***
***Hit the switch to activate the door.***
***Modern Lab path opening in 5secs. RUN!!***
zh_trans: ***现代实验室的道路将在5秒后开启。快撤退！***

original: ***Activate the lift and hold the boxes while it powers up!***
zh_trans: ***激活电梯，并守住箱子！直到电力恢复***

original: ***Tram leaving in 25secs!***
***Careful scaling across the top on the crates!***
zh_trans: ***小心翼翼地从箱子顶部横越过去！***

original: ***Tram leaving in 5secs!***
***Tram leaving!***
***Tram power has shut down! Zombies can now walk across!***
zh_trans: ***缆车电力现在彻底关停了！僵尸现在可以从轨道上走过去！***

original: ***Use the pipes along the wall to get across the pit of fire!***
zh_trans: ***沿着墙边的管道越过火坑！不要掉下去！***

original: ***Make your way to the other end of the ballroom! There's a hole in the railing to can use to make it to the second floor!***
zh_trans: ***走到舞厅的另一端！那里有个缺口，你可以在那里爬上二楼***

original: ***Launch Bay Open!***
***RUN! Get into the Submarine! Zombie can't get in!***
zh_trans: ***快跑！赶紧进潜艇！僵尸们进不去！***

original: ***Submarine leaving in 30secs!***
***Grab any weapons or nades you might need!***
zh_trans: ***拿起任何你需要的武器或手雷***

original: ***Get in and hold the control room!***
***Jump and slide down to use the ladders to get off the ceiling!***
zh_trans: ***跳下并滑落以使用梯子从天花板上下来！***

original: ***We made it just in time!***
***OH NO! They got on board!***
***We can't let them reach the surface!***
***Damn! The only way to get rid of them is to activate the Atomic Core overload program!***
zh_trans: ***妈的! 只有启动核能核心超载程序才能摆脱它们！***

original: ***ACTIVATE THE CORE OVERLOAD FROM THE CONSOLE!!!***
***Submarine Atomic Core overload activated! Full overload in 45secs!***
zh_trans: ***潜艇核能核心超载程序已启动！距离完全超载还有45秒***

original: ***Submarine Atomic Core overload at 25%!***
***Submarine Atomic Core overload at 60%!***
***Right Gate opening in 20secs!***
***Right Gate opening!***
***Submarine Atomic Core overload at 95%!***
***CORE OVERLOAD ERROR**
***Manual activation required!**
***Someone has to go back there and activate the core!***
***Someone take the overhead ladder! Everyone else give them cover fire!***
zh_trans: ***快去架梯子，其他人火力掩护！***

original: ***Hurry up! We only have to 10secs left!!***
***CORE OVERLOAD 100%!**
***...We made it...**
***...Thank you...<<Insert Name Here>>...**
***Thank You for Playing!!***
***Left Gate opening in 20secs!***
***Left Gate opening!***
